table.name: user_student_relation
table.sql: SELECT student_no FROM test_scr where name=%s and school='元高分实验中学' GROUP BY student_no

table.name: user
table.sql: SELECT test_id FROM test_scr where school_id=160101 and name=%s and cand_no=%s and is_credible=1

table.name: scr_dimensiongoals
table.sql: SELECT DISTINCT `name`,avggoals,cand_no,test_id,quest_id,goals,num FROM `scr_dimensiongoals` WHERE cand_no=%s AND test_id=%s;

table.name: answer
table.sql: select avg(score) FROM answer where test_id=%s and cand_no=%s and quest_id=%s and score!=0 and stem_no!=%s;

table.name: quest_history_info
table.sql: SELECT history_avg,history_standard_deviation FROM quest_history_info where quest_id=%s;

table.name: standard_normal_info
table.sql: SELECT results_value FROM standard_normal_info where original_value=%s;

table.name: quest_history_info_dimension
table.sql: SELECT dimension_info FROM quest_history_info where quest_id=%s;

table.name: user_openid
table.sql: SELECT weixin_openid FROM user where v3_user_id=(SELECT parent_userid FROM user_student_relation where student_name=%s and school=%s and parent_type_name is not NULL);
